name: Zazzle Store Gallery
author: Roman

sections.description:
Seamlessly integrate a Zazzle store gallery
and sell a variety of custom products (t-shirts, mugs, hats, etc…).

Easily configure your Zazzle store through the Settings section in the
Administration interface:

  • Limit your store to a certain product line only
  • Choose a background color for product images
  • Select product image size (tiny, small, medium, large, huge)
  • Select a product listing design theme

Other Features

  • Shortcode support with TinyMCE button config screen
  • Semantic HTML markup with plenty of hooks for your own themes
  • Comes with multiple themes out-of-the-box
  • Widget support

Future Plans

  • More shortcode configuration features
  • More built-in themes
  • Pagination for multi-page results
  • Product details rearrangement
  • Feed and image caching
  • Better SEO features
  • Theme tag support
  • Contextual product display

Visit Babble Goons Hip Hop website for more details and usage examples.

Changes

July 15, 2010

  • Added new product lines
  • Added widget support
sections.installation:
1. Upload “zazzle” directory to the “/wp-content/plugins/” directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the “Plugins” menu in WordPress
  3. Configure the plugin through the Settings -> Zazzle screen
  4. Insert a shortcode into your post using the [Z] button in TinyMCE editor (e.g. [zazzle rows="1" cols="4"])
sections.faq:
A question that someone might have

An answer to that question.
